entry.title: Testing the news feed entry url.

content.h1: Testing the news feed entry url.
content.p: Apparently, the feed to twitter tool with https://ifttt.com/ (cool stuff BTW) can't attach the xml:base to a relative feed url, thus, this introduces a globally absolute url for the feed uri.

entry.title: Hello World. Testing the news feed.

content.h1: Hello World. Testing the news feed.
content.p: I'm currently building a tool to generate a nice website from the Atem-Project git repository. The plan is to have https://travis-ci.org/ continuously update the gh-pages branch, and thus the final website.
This will make a great tool to collaborate on project work in Atem-Project.
I'm looking forward to release the beast, but this is just a test run.
